data.text: @ArtForHLC AL doesn't have a waiting list, so we applied for an E&D waiver as soon as we knew what it was and that the IMP qualified.  It still is hard to get certain things even with medicaid.
@stephlshep I hope things can improve for you guys 💜

@stephlshep Ugh I’m sorry. Things have thankfully improved, but I was desperate for a night nurse from age 3-4.5 when I was up constantly every night dealing with seizures and oxygen needs. It’s was horrific. We are still on the waitlist for waiver support 😞 Are you on a waitlist? #CDKL5

@ArtForHLC The past few weeks we have had too much nighttime activity and I think the IMP has her sleep schedule off. Friday night she got a break, but I woke up almost every hour waiting for a seizure. Sigh. I wish we qualified for a night nurse.
